snippet.description:
Subscribe for more GTLive action! ►►http://bit.ly/1Oo7KH9 
Pony Island: Horsies From HELL! ►► http://bit.ly/1OJ3xcZ
FNAF World Pt 3: Hot Cheesy End! ►► http://bit.ly/1STZboh

For this Scary Games Friday (TGI-SGF!) we dove into the DEPTHS of the game that STARTED the Undertale craze! The Earthbound Halloween Hack is the SUPER DARK spin-off of the Earthbound series that shows where Toby Fox got all of his best game developer tropes. It's like OG Undertale, and it is AWESOME.

TEASER: If you watch this episode, you'll be getting a pretty sneaky preview of my Undertale Theory coming out this week...

Follow all the updates on new episodes of GTLive!

Subscribe & hang out with us every day! ►► http://bit.ly/1Oo7KH9
Follow us on Twitter at @MatPatGT and #GTLive

Don't have much time but need a quick fix? Check out some of our highlight episodes for hilarious moments from our live streams. Here are a few to get you started.

HiLite: FNAF Theorists SURPRISED by Scott ► http://bit.ly/1Jrlm3i
HiLite: FNAF vs FLY! ►► http://bit.ly/1R1UnxI
HiLite: MatPat Chokes in Megaman X ►► http://bit.ly/1Q8N71N
snippet.title: Undertale Origins - The Earthbound Halloween Hack! (Part 1)
